remarks: The image of a group homomorphism from ` G ` to ` H ` is a subgroup of ` H ` (inference version).  (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 25-Feb-2008.)
statement:
ghomgrpi.1 $e |- G e. GrpOp $.
ghomgrpi.2 $e |- H e. GrpOp $.
ghomgrpi.3 $e |- F e. ( G GrpOpHom H ) $.
ghomgrpi.4 $e |- Y = ran F $.
ghomgrpi.5 $e |- S = ( H |` ( Y X. Y ) ) $.
ghomgrpi $p |- S e. ( SubGrpOp ` H ) $.
